name: Resume12345
body:
### About Me
My name is Megan. I am a final year master’s degree student studying Professional Economics at Victoria University. I am fascinated with data analysis in an exceptional analytical aptitude and attention to details, and I feel greatly interested in data analysing. 

My degree involves Econometrics, data analysis and statistics. And I also learn RStudio, MySQL, Python, Tableau, Adobe Photoshop, Stata and MATLAB during my study. In particular, my study of the Duke University course “Excel to MySQL: Analytic Technology for Business” has given me a strong background to perform the creation, maintenance and testing of scripts, as well as diagnosis of customer issues.

My professional experience as a Manager at Shixi.com company (the first global internship and employment platform in China, similar to Seek.com) has endowed me with the ability to quickly adapt to new technologies, and excellent communication as well as writing skills. I am also well-organised and display self-driven traits.


### Career Objective
My objective is to secure a position in data analyst where I can combine my interest in quantitative data collection and analysis in sharing the business insights gained.


### My Skills
Softwares:
• RStudio, MySQL, Python, Tableau, Adobe Photoshop, Stata and MATLAB
• Excellent at Microsoft Excel, Word and PowerPoint

Personal:
Curious, Teamwork, Driven, Efficient, Outgoing, Sincere, Passionate


### My Experience
Manager,
Shixi.com Company----2015.11 - 2016.06

• Founded Shixi Elite Club to help Chinese students look for jobs
• Planned activities, communicated with sponsors, checked and accepted job applications
• Processed new information and documentation about incoming students quickly
• Composed club regulations and arranged weekly meetings

Volunteer Assistant Manager,
Confidence Management Consulting Limited----2015.10 - 2016.02

• Exhibited great communication skills by acting as a receptionist, provided information and friendly demeanour to clients
• Set up office meetings and hired employees
• Edited tourism articles

Assistant Book Editor,
Liaoning Fine Arts Publishing House----2015.11 - 2016.01

• Assisted in editing and publishing the follow books: Animation Art History of the World and 3D Game Design
• Displayed interpersonal skills by communicating with the Editor and writers

Outreach and Emergency Coordinator,
Beijing Red Cross Emergency Rescue Centre,
Beijing Information Science and Technology University----2012.09 – 2014.07

• Provided information and informed knowledge about medication and emergency treatments
• Communicated with a diverse range of university students


### My Interests
My hobbies are swimming, playing badminton and table tennis. I also like travelling to explore different cities and learn about local cultures and historical stories, having visited Oriented Pearl Tower in Shanghai, the Great Wall and the Forbidden City in Beijing, Terracotta Army in Xi’an, Panda Base in Chengdu, and so on. In addition, I used to be a keyboard player of a campus music band in Beijing.


### My Activities
I upload my some Videos(https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLovF-3ynvU9Fg05QooDhC3hDwiruVOipH) of the activities in Wellington. Have a look at it.
